trans-unit.source: Desired State Configuration Overview for Decision Makers
trans-unit.target: Desired State Configuration Overview for Decision Makers

trans-unit.source: This document describes the business benefits of using PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC).
trans-unit.target: This document describes the business benefits of using PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC).

trans-unit.source: It is not a technical guide.
trans-unit.target: It is not a technical guide.

trans-unit.source: What Is Desired State Configuration?
trans-unit.target: What Is Desired State Configuration?

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a configuration platform built into Windows that is based on open standards.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a configuration platform built into Windows that is based on open standards.

trans-unit.source: DSC is flexible enough to function reliably and consistently in each stage of the deployment lifecycle (development, test, pre-production, production), as well as during scale-out.
trans-unit.target: DSC is flexible enough to function reliably and consistently in each stage of the deployment lifecycle (development, test, pre-production, production), as well as during scale-out.

trans-unit.source: DSC centers around the idea of "<link><linkText>configurations</linkText><title>, which are easy-to-read documents that describe an environment made up of computers ("nodes</title></link> with specific characteristics.
trans-unit.target: DSC centers around the idea of "<link><linkText>configurations</linkText><title>, which are easy-to-read documents that describe an environment made up of computers ("nodes</title></link> with specific characteristics.

trans-unit.source: These characteristics can be as simple as ensuring a specific Windows feature is enabled, or as complex as deploying SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: These characteristics can be as simple as ensuring a specific Windows feature is enabled, or as complex as deploying SharePoint.

trans-unit.source: DSC also has monitoring and reporting built in.
trans-unit.target: DSC also has monitoring and reporting built in.

trans-unit.source: If a system is no longer compliant, DSC can raise an alert and act to correct the system.
trans-unit.target: If a system is no longer compliant, DSC can raise an alert and act to correct the system.

trans-unit.source: Benefits of Using Desired State Configuration
trans-unit.target: Benefits of Using Desired State Configuration

trans-unit.source: Configurations are designed to be easily read, stored, and updated.
trans-unit.target: Configurations are designed to be easily read, stored, and updated.

trans-unit.source: Configurations simply declare the state target devices should be in, instead of writing instructions for how to put them in that state.
trans-unit.target: Configurations simply declare the state target devices should be in, instead of writing instructions for how to put them in that state.

trans-unit.source: This makes it much less costly for to learn, adopt, implement, and maintain configuration through DSC.
trans-unit.target: This makes it much less costly for to learn, adopt, implement, and maintain configuration through DSC.

trans-unit.source: Creating configurations means that complex deployment steps are captured as a "single source of truth" in a single location.
trans-unit.target: Creating configurations means that complex deployment steps are captured as a "single source of truth" in a single location.

trans-unit.source: This makes repeated deployments of a specific set of machines much less error-prone.
trans-unit.target: This makes repeated deployments of a specific set of machines much less error-prone.

trans-unit.source: In turn, this makes deployments faster and more reliable.
trans-unit.target: In turn, this makes deployments faster and more reliable.

trans-unit.source: This enables quick turnaround on complex deployments.
trans-unit.target: This enables quick turnaround on complex deployments.

trans-unit.source: Configurations are also shareable via the PowerShell gallery.
trans-unit.target: Configurations are also shareable via the PowerShell gallery.

trans-unit.source: This means common scenarios and best practices might already exist for the work you need done.
trans-unit.target: This means common scenarios and best practices might already exist for the work you need done.

trans-unit.source: Desired State Configuration and DevOps
trans-unit.target: Desired State Configuration and DevOps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>DevOps</linkText><title></title></link> is a combination of people, technologies and culture that allow for rapid deployment and iteration.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>DevOps</linkText><title></title></link> is a combination of people, technologies and culture that allow for rapid deployment and iteration.

trans-unit.source: DSC was designed with DevOps in mind.
trans-unit.target: DSC was designed with DevOps in mind.

trans-unit.source: Having a single configuration define an environment means that developers can encode their requirements into a configuration, check that configuration into source control, and operations teams can easily deploy code without having to go through error-prone manual processes.
trans-unit.target: Having a single configuration define an environment means that developers can encode their requirements into a configuration, check that configuration into source control, and operations teams can easily deploy code without having to go through error-prone manual processes.

trans-unit.source: Configurations are also <link><linkText>data-driven</linkText><title></title></link>, which makes it easier for ops teams to identify and change environments without developer intervention.
trans-unit.target: Configurations are also <link><linkText>data-driven</linkText><title></title></link>, which makes it easier for ops teams to identify and change environments without developer intervention.

trans-unit.source: Desired State Configuration On and Off Premise
trans-unit.target: Desired State Configuration On and Off Premise

trans-unit.source: DSC can be used to manage both on-premise and off-premise deployments.
trans-unit.target: DSC can be used to manage both on-premise and off-premise deployments.

trans-unit.source: For on-premise solutions, Desired State Configuration has a <link><linkText>pull server</linkText><title></title></link> that can be used to centralize management of machines and report on their status.
trans-unit.target: For on-premise solutions, Desired State Configuration has a <link><linkText>pull server</linkText><title></title></link> that can be used to centralize management of machines and report on their status.

trans-unit.source: For cloud solutions, Desired State Configuration is usable wherever Windows is usable.
trans-unit.target: For cloud solutions, Desired State Configuration is usable wherever Windows is usable.

trans-unit.source: There are also specific offerings from Azure built on Desired State Configuration, such as <link><linkText>Azure Automation</linkText><title></title></link>, which centralizes reporting of Desired State Configuration.
trans-unit.target: There are also specific offerings from Azure built on Desired State Configuration, such as <link><linkText>Azure Automation</linkText><title></title></link>, which centralizes reporting of Desired State Configuration.

trans-unit.source: DSC and Compatibility
trans-unit.target: DSC and Compatibility

trans-unit.source: Although DSC was introduced in Windows Server 2012 R2, it is available for downlevel operating systems via the Windows Management Framework (WMF) package.
trans-unit.target: Although DSC was introduced in Windows Server 2012 R2, it is available for downlevel operating systems via the Windows Management Framework (WMF) package.

trans-unit.source: More information about the WMF can be found on the <link><linkText>PowerShell landing page</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: More information about the WMF can be found on the <link><linkText>PowerShell landing page</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: DSC can also be used to manage Linux.
trans-unit.target: DSC can also be used to manage Linux.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Getting Started with DSC for Linux</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Getting Started with DSC for Linux</linkText><title></title></link>
